Reachy 2.text:
CAPABILITIES: Reachy 2 is a humanoid robot platform designed for developers, researchers, and robotics enthusiasts. It provides a comprehensive set of tools for control, animation, and simulation. The documentation includes step-by-step guides, tools, and tutorials to help users unlock its full potential.

FEATURES: The Reachy 2 documentation offers detailed information on setup, basic controls, and advanced features. It includes guides for Jupyter Notebook, RViz, Gazebo, and MuJoCo integration. Prerequisites include Docker Desktop installation. The product also supports real-time object detection, emotion display, and AI-powered perception.

LINKS: https://pollen-robotics.com/reachy-2s-online-documentation

NOTE: The product is developed by Pollen Robotics and is open-source with Docker access.

company.text:
NAME: Pollen Robotics

CONTACT: Not explicitly provided

LOCATION: Website URL: https://pollen-robotics.com

POSITIONING: Pollen Robotics is a company focused on robotics and AI, providing humanoid robots and related tools for developers and researchers. They emphasize open-source solutions and accessibility.
